org.richfaces.Page org.richfaces.Page org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlPage org.richfaces.component.UIPage
pageHeader
header
footer

org.richfaces.PageRenderer org/richfaces/htmlPage.jspx
page org.richfaces.taglib.PageTag
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
org.richfaces.taglib.PageTagHandler
&ui_component_attributes; &html_universal_attributes;
pageTitle java.lang.String
String for output as a page title.
onload java.lang.String
JavaScript code to execute on a page load.
onunload java.lang.String
JavaScript code to execute on a page unload.
markupType java.lang.String
Page layout format ( html, xhtml, html-transitional, html-3.2 ) for encoding DOCTYPE, namespace and Content-Type definitions
theme java.lang.String Specifies the way of the component rendering
contentType java.lang.String
Set custom mime content type to response
namespace java.lang.String
Set html element default namespace
width int
Sets the width of the page
sidebarWidth int
Defines width for the side panel. Default value is "160".
160
sidebarPosition java.lang.String
Defines the position of the side panel. Possible values are "left", "right". Default value is "left".
headerClass java.lang.String
A name of CSS class for the header
footerClass java.lang.String
A name of CSS class for the footer
bodyClass java.lang.String
A name of CSS class for the body part of the page
sidebarClass java.lang.String
A name of CSS class for the side panel
